metadata.title: CVE-2022-1128 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Web Share API in Google Chrome on Windowsprior to 100.0.4896.60 allowed an attacker on the local network segment toleak cross-origin data via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
